0.1.name: wordpress/tinymce-youtube-embed
0.1.description:
If you want to embed YouTube videos in your posts but don't want to copy the embed code every time, this plugin is here to help. This plugin integrates with the default WP editor (TinyMCE) and creates a YouTube button that can be easily used to embed YouTube videos. The only thing you need to embed a video is its URL. Any URL will do the job (long or short format).

Enjoy this simple yet useful plugin which takes you one step towards easier blogging.
